Squizzy::
Sees Amp attacking Life and grabs the tranquilizer gun out from a 
drawer. She aimed and fired on AMP. Three darts  with a knock out 
drug flew at Amp.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Amp::
>      In a sudden fit of rage he looks back down and turns his hand 
over 
> bringing his one blade to bear at Life's neck.  He raises his hand 
up and 
> brings it down repeatedly in a sieries of fierce blows across 
Life's throat.
